comments.text:
sure! ^^ The one in all black is Jay, the maknae and main dancer and 
rapper, the one with blue hair and a parrot looking outfit is Injun, the 
vocalist and his rapping/beatbox is really good along with Jay, Hyunmin is 
the one with baggy green pants and short curly hair and he's also the 
vocalist (every member can sing really well, you should check out their 
acapellas :)) Karam is the one with the red shirt and skirt thing, he's 
vocalist and dance, and Mika has the long curly noodle hair and he's the 
leader and main vocal. :))

comments.text:
They debuted back in 2010 as DGNA, and even before that they were all in 
another group called Xing. However due to a huge scandal involving the CEO 
of their former company(open world ent.) they had to stop promotions in 
korea 2012 and they had to find a new company (Before that they did recieve 
decent attention, esp in Japan) so their new company doesnt have as much 
funds to promote them properly but they are super amazingly talented 
vocally. Their acapellas are gorgeous. One of the members choreographed the 
dance to this song and they can compose and write lyrics and just yeah. 
They are not rookies in any way.

comments.author: Morgan Selena

comments.text:
This is a clear copy of the style of Big Bang. Not only the music, style of 
singing, gesture, the music video's ambient or aesthetic and clothes, but 
even the title is copying their style: 'Rilla Go!' remember me of Big 
Bang's 'Garagara Go!' (though the two music videos are very different in 
that case). I know many K-Pop groups imitate others , but Big Bang (and 
their good music company YG Entertainment) started in 2006 with a new and 
original style refreshing the K-Pop. Later many groups started to imitate 
them.﻿

comments.author: Corina “Blue Sea” Peugh

comments.text:
+Destiny Deer +M Smith +Corina Peugh 
Hey there! I'm surprised no one answered you!!! =(
So the one with long blond hair and the black face paint is leader Mika, 
he's a 1990.
The one in red with cheetah spots is second oldest Karam, he's a 1991.
The one in the wolf skin thingie is middle kid Hyunmin, he's also a 1991.
The blond with the multi-colors is Injun, he's a 1992.
And the one in all black is maknae Jay, a 1994.
Any questions at all, i am always happy to share knowledge about them!! 
Also, watch their recent Pops in Seoul Secret Box, they're so funny =D
